snippet.title: Timberborn Update 3 has arrived!
snippet.description:
📦 A new storage system, recyclable buildings, redesigned beaver bots, QoL improvements - these are the highlights of the new major update for Timberborn, live now!

🤯 Check the full Update 3 announcement and patch notes:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1062090/view/3642880119681331392

🌳 Get the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
https://www.gog.com/game/timberborn
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/timberborn

-- About Timberborn --
Humans are gone. Will your society of lumberpunk beavers do any better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, river control, and deadly droughts.

The game is available in English, Polish, Ukrainian, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and Japanese. For a localized description, check the store pages linked above.

-- Features --
🦦 Unique beaver factions*
💦 Droughts
🧨 River control with dams and dynamite
🪓 Timber-tech machinery
🏡 Vertical settlements
⛰️ Destructible terrain
🌇 Day and night cycle
🥕 Wellbeing mechanics
🗾 Map editor
...and more!
(*) Yes, that's an otter.

-- Find us on: --
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
http://discord.gg/timberborn/
https://twitter.com/Timberborn/
https://www.facebook.com/TimberbornGame
https://www.tiktok.com/@mechanistry
